review: The fire stick is a great way to watch internet video on a non internet TV,  Pros: Access internet channels on a TV without wifi built in.  Easy to set up and use.  Cons: Needs an AC adapter to run which take up another outlet.  Where the AC adapter plugs in to the FireStick is an awkward placement. The cord is heavy pulling the stick downward.Overall a great way to watch Internet TV!
